name: Daniel Hutchings
oneLiner: Frontend Developer, DIY fundamentalist, dreams in JSON...

highlights: Key React developer on global enterprise websites (Jaegermeister, Dr. Oetker)
Configured graphql based CMS with UIs for multiple markets and languages
Developed custom apis to query NFT data held on distributed IPFS
Improved code review process with templates and best practice
Streamlined tech recruitment with more efficient code challenge
Produced VueJS dashboards to show the health of content sets (e.g. currency, broken links)
Used Python data analysis tools to pull key stats and plot behavioural change
Built a Chrome/IE plugin in vanilla Javascript to serve relevant LexisNexis search results based on what the user was currently looking at
Used Python, Perl, VB and XSLT to convert multiple sources to bespoke XML
Created and negotiated SLAs and SOWs with offshore suppliers
JavaScript, JSP, Java, C+, CSS, HTML, Director, Flash
Digital and analog tape editing & recording, music theory, graphic and web design

interests: I love DIY, especially woodworking, and over the last few years have been restoring a ruin of a house on the side of an old volcano in Lanzarote.
I'm always training for the next marathon. So far I have Barcelona 2017 and Sevilla 2020 under my belt.
